definitions.definition: An organic compound , C 8 H 7 N, found in coal tar , and produced in the gut by the bacterial decomposition of tryptophan ; it is an aromatic bicyclic heterocycle having a benzene ring fused with a pyrrole ring; indole and its derivatives occur widely in nature and have many industrial applications .
Any of the derivatives of indole.

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) An organic compound , C 8 H 7 N, found in coal tar , and produced in the gut by the bacterial decomposition of tryptophan ; it is an aromatic bicyclic heterocycle having a benzene ring fused with a pyrrole ring; indole and its derivatives occur widely in nature and have many industrial applications .
secondary_definitions: ( organic chemistry ) Any of the derivatives of indole.
